Posts.Content: Oct 12, 2016 03:40AM BevSue wrote: Jiffrig- I have lymphedema of the legs and use a lymphedema pump. It is a electric pump with sleeves that cover both legs. The sleeves inflate and deflate. Mine came from a company called Vaso Care.
Posts.Title: Is there such a thing as a lymphedema home massage machine? Jiffrig DC197
